description: Ursula von der Leyen replaced Jean-Claude Juncker as the European Commission president.
title: Ursula von der Leyen: First woman to lead the EU
title_page: Ursula von der Leyen: First woman to lead the EU - BBC News
maintext: She was not the first choice for the EU's most powerful job. She was not especially popular in her previous role among Germany's armed forces, and only emerged from the shadows as a candidate for Commission chief when initial compromise deals collapsed.
